items.content_html: `export-json-to-csv` is a lightweight, high-performance npm package for converting JSON to CSV. It supports nested JSON structures, customizable headers, and handles large datasets efficientlyâ€”ideal for seamless data export and interchange.
items.title: john310897/export-json-to-csv: `export-json-to-csv` is a lightweight, high-performance npm package for converting JSON to CSV. It supports nested JSON structures, customizable headers, and handles large datasets efficientlyâ€”ideal for seamless data export and interchange.

items.content_html: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX. It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead. Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
items.title: Bhargavxyz738/Lazy-CSS: Lazy CSS is a lightweight, utility-first CSS framework that generates styles on-demand as you use them in your HTML or JSX.  It offers a Tailwind-like experience but with a "lazy" approach, minimizing CSS overhead.  Supports vanilla JS and React, with easy configuration and a wide range of pre-defined utilities and color palettes.
